scenarios.name: Schedule Consultation
questions: I'd like to schedule a consultation for my daughter.
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Ask age, availability, mention free consultation, provide time slots

scenarios.name: Urgent Appointment
questions: I need to see someone this week if possible.
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Check availability, offer earliest slots, explain urgency process

scenarios.name: Evening Appointment
questions: Do you have any evening appointments? I work during the day.
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Mention evening hours, offer specific times

scenarios.name: Saturday Appointment
questions: Can I come in on Saturday?
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Confirm Saturday hours, offer available times

scenarios.name: Cancel Appointment
questions: I need to cancel my appointment next Tuesday.
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Acknowledge cancellation, ask for rescheduling, mention policy

scenarios.name: Reschedule Appointment
questions: Can I move my appointment to next week instead?
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Help with rescheduling, check availability, confirm new time

scenarios.name: Group Appointment
questions: Can I schedule appointments for both my kids at the same time?
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Try to accommodate, explain if not possible, offer alternatives

scenarios.name: Records Appointment
questions: I need to schedule my records appointment.
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Explain records process, schedule appropriate time slot

scenarios.name: Adjustment Appointment
questions: When is my next adjustment appointment?
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Check schedule, explain typical adjustment frequency

scenarios.name: Virtual Consultation
questions: Can I do a virtual consultation instead of coming in?
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Explain virtual options, limitations, offer in-person benefits
